alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cuyahoga and southwestern Lake Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cleveland Heights, or 7 miles east of Cleveland, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Willowick, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Solon, Willoughby, Eastlake, Warrensville Heights, Highland Hills, Timberlake, Lakeline, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, Maple Heights, South Euclid, Mayfield Heights, East Cleveland, Lyndhurst, University Heights and Bedford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
